WorkItem.ClosedComment: The JavaScript window is a Web Essentials feature. Please file a bug there.
WorkItem.Description:
Running VS2013 on Windows 8.1 with WebEssentials 2013 and TypeScript 1.0 RC.

The dual pane editor only shows the scroll bar for the typescript code. The corresponding JavaScript code window does NOT use a vertical or horizontal scroll bar thus you can not see all the generated JavaScript code while in the editor.
WorkItem.Summary: VS2013 plugin - editor is missing scrollbar
